General.Name: Ningbo Fujia Industrial Co Ltd
General.Description: Ningbo Fujia Industrial Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells vacuum cleaners, motors, and vacuum cleaner spare parts in China. It also exports its products to approximately 40 countries, such as the United States, the European countries, the Middle East, Japan, Korea, etc. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Yuyao, China.
